name: Virion - Prototype
description:
Command and create an army of Viruses in this mini RTS game!

Defeat the human immune system's hordes of enemies.


RTS Game Mechanics

Virion is a prototype of a RTS game that is set in the human body where the player plays as the invading  virus trying to consume the host. The colony has to survive against wave after wave of the immune system's deadly army.

Development/Prototype

This was one of the first games we have attempted to make as a team and one of the biggest lessons we learned was scope. Starting of with a grand idea that was a little bit to much for us to do.

Nether the less, we bring you Virion, our prototype of what could have been! And possibly will be one day.

Known Bugs

We apologise for the amount of bugs and frustrating gameplay features of which there are a few. We got to the stage where we learnt as much as we could with this project, hit so many bricks walls and decided that we should put it to rest.

- Enemies falling into the abyss.

- HUD not displaying what is being built properly.

- Units get stuck in some corridors.

- Various Collision problems.

- Enemies fail to attack infantry sometimes.

- Various other bugs.



Music

Most of our music and audio has been created from scratch by Joscha Gut JAhr, our audio specialist.
